synopsis.text: Kogoro Mouri's latest purchase, a sleek Wooo television set from Hitachi, takes center stage in this captivating web series, 'Detective Conan vs. Wooo.' As the Mouri household gathers around the new addition to watch a riveting drama, the self-proclaimed 'sleeping' detective attempts to outwit everyone by unveiling the mystery's true culprit. Meanwhile, the renowned idol Maomi Yuuki seeks help from the agency to resolve her parents' television recording dilemmas. Conan, along with the innovative Wooo, might just hold the key to solving her predicament. This thrilling web short not only highlights Hitachi's Wooo line of televisions but also showcases the unique blend of detective work and technology.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
